title: Romeo and Juliet
tagline: A timeless love story by William Shakespeare.
description: Set in Verona, this classic tale follows the passionate and tragic love story of Romeo and Juliet, two young lovers from feuding families. Despite the odds, they fight for their love in a world filled with hatred and misunderstanding. This production breathes fresh life into Shakespeare's iconic masterpiece, blending powerful performances with stunning visual design. Perfect for both first-time theatergoers and seasoned enthusiasts.
importantNotice: Please arrive 30 minutes early for bag checks.
